svg.style: background: transparent; background-color: transparent; color-scheme: light dark;
svg.content:
<mxfile host="app.diagrams.net" agent="Mozilla/5.0 (X11; Linux x86_64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/144.0.0.0 Safari/537.36" scale="1" border="0" version="29.3.4"> <diagram name="Page-1" id="TIUnbjKMvUNjSM6PQYOg"> <mxGraphModel dx="2268" dy="2732" grid="1" gridSize="10" guides="1" tooltips="1" connect="1" arrows="1" fold="1" page="1" pageScale="1" pageWidth="850" pageHeight="1100" math="0" shadow="0"> <root> <mxCell id="0" /> <mxCell id="1" parent="0" /> <mxCell id="s1" parent="1" style="rounded=1;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;strokeWidth=2;fillColor=#BFC6EE;strokeColor=#3D7ECF;fontSize=16;" value="S1
Observations
(measurements)" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry height="110" width="220" x="40" y="280" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="s2" parent="1" style="rounded=1;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;strokeWidth=3;fillColor=#A0C8B0;strokeColor=#288058;fontSize=16;" value="S2
Derived raster and observation products
(pixel/station support preserved)" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry height="150" width="360" x="360" y="250" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="s3" parent="1" style="rounded=1;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;strokeWidth=2;opacity=60;fillColor=#A0B8D8;strokeColor=#2868B0;fontSize=16;" value="S3
Segmentation / objects
(spatial units)" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry height="110" width="240" x="770" y="280" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="s4" parent="1" style="rounded=1;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;strokeWidth=2;opacity=60;fillColor=#E0A0A0;strokeColor=#C03030;fontSize=16;" value="S4
Signatures
(object descriptors)" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry height="110" width="220" x="1040" y="280" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="s5" parent="1" style="rounded=1;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;strokeWidth=2;opacity=60;fillColor=#D8D0F0;strokeColor=#6840C0;fontSize=16;" value="S5
Decision logic
(ranking/selection)" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry height="110" width="220" x="1290" y="280" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="e1" edge="1" parent="1" source="s1" style="endArrow=block;html=1;strokeWidth=2;strokeColor=#3D7ECF;fontSize=16;" target="s2"> <mxGeometry relative="1" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="e2" edge="1" parent="1" source="s2" style="endArrow=block;html=1;strokeWidth=2;opacity=60;strokeColor=#288058;fontSize=16;" target="s3"> <mxGeometry relative="1" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="e3" edge="1" parent="1" source="s3" style="endArrow=block;html=1;strokeWidth=2;opacity=60;strokeColor=#2868B0;fontSize=16;" target="s4"> <mxGeometry relative="1" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="e4" edge="1" parent="1" source="s4" style="endArrow=block;html=1;strokeWidth=2;opacity=60;strokeColor=#C03030;fontSize=16;" target="s5"> <mxGeometry relative="1" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="s2q" parent="1" style="rounded=1;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;strokeWidth=1;fillColor=#FFFFFF;strokeColor=#288058;fontSize=16;" value="S2 question
What can be derived directly from measurements in space/time
before segmentation, objects, or decisions?" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry height="100" width="460" x="-115" y="-90" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="s2ex" parent="1" style="rounded=1;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;strokeWidth=1;align=left;spacingLeft=11;fillColor=#FFFFFF;strokeColor=#288058;fontSize=16;" value="S2 excludes
• S3 objects / segmentations
• S4 object signatures
• S4L learned representations
• S5 ranking/selection/optimisation" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry height="100" width="420" x="880" y="-100" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="s2dp" parent="1" style="rounded=1;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;strokeWidth=1;align=left;spacingLeft=10;fillColor=#FFFFFF;strokeColor=#288058;fontSize=16;" value="S2 design principles
• registry-defined IO (no hard-coded paths)
• explicit transformations (no silent smoothing/aggregation)
• controlled spatial support (canonical 10 m grid)
• descriptive-only station summaries (no decision logic)" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry height="100" width="440" x="400" y="-100" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="pf_title" parent="1" style="text;html=1;fontStyle=1;fontSize=16;" value="S2 product families (Burgwald implementation)" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry height="30" width="600" x="-45" y="-140" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="pf_dem" parent="1" style="rounded=1;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;strokeWidth=2;fillColor=#A0C8B0;strokeColor=#288058;fontSize=16;" value="Terrain / hydrological derivatives
DEM → morphometry, flow, distance, watersheds
Script: 02-1_processing_dem-derivates-saga.R" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry height="120" width="430" x="100" y="70" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="pf_dom" parent="1" style="rounded=1;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;strokeWidth=2;fillColor=#A0C8B0;strokeColor=#288058;fontSize=16;" value="Biostructural derivatives
DOM/DSM + DEM → CHM + aggregated canopy metrics
Script: 02-1_processing_dom-biostructure-derivates.R" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry height="120" width="430" x="560" y="70" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="pf_bfast" parent="1" style="rounded=1;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;strokeWidth=2;fillColor=#A0C8B0;strokeColor=#288058;fontSize=16;" value="Time-series change diagnostics
Per-pixel BFAST / disturbance indicators
Script: 02-2_processing_bfast-classification.R" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry height="140" width="430" x="90" y="480" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="pf_wind" parent="1" style="rounded=1;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;strokeWidth=2;fillColor=#A0C8B0;strokeColor=#288058;fontSize=16;" value="Descriptive climate summaries (stations)
Wind roses / frequency tables / plots
No optimisation/selection logic
Script: 02-4_analysis_burgwald-dwd-wind-rose.R" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry height="140" width="430" x="560" y="480" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="e_pf1" edge="1" parent="1" source="pf_dem" style="endArrow=block;html=1;strokeWidth=2;strokeColor=#288058;fontSize=16;" target="s2"> <mxGeometry relative="1" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="e_pf2" edge="1" parent="1" source="pf_dom" style="endArrow=block;html=1;strokeWidth=2;strokeColor=#288058;fontSize=16;" target="s2"> <mxGeometry relative="1" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="e_pf4" edge="1" parent="1" source="pf_bfast" style="endArrow=block;html=1;strokeWidth=2;strokeColor=#288058;fontSize=16;" target="s2"> <mxGeometry relative="1" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="e_pf6" edge="1" parent="1" source="pf_wind" style="endArrow=block;html=1;strokeWidth=2;strokeColor=#288058;fontSize=16;" target="s2"> <mxGeometry relative="1" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> </root> </mxGraphModel> </diagram> </mxfile>

rect.style: fill: light-dark(rgb(191, 198, 238), rgb(58, 64, 99)); stroke: light-dark(rgb(61, 126, 207), rgb(87, 143, 213));

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 218px; height: 1px; padding-top: 475px; margin-left: 156px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: center; color: #000000;
display: inline-block; font-size: 16px; font-family: Helvetica; color: light-dark(#000000, #ffffff); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;

S2

(pixel/station support preserved)

div.div:
S2 question
What can be derived directly from measurements in space/time
before segmentation, objects, or decisions?

rect.style: fill: light-dark(rgb(255, 255, 255), rgb(18, 18, 18)); stroke: light-dark(rgb(40, 128, 88), rgb(88, 164, 130));

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe flex-start; width: 407px; height: 1px; padding-top: 90px; margin-left: 1008px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: left; color: #000000;
display: inline-block; font-size: 16px; font-family: Helvetica; color: light-dark(#000000, #ffffff); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;

div.div:
S2 excludes
• S3 objects / segmentations
• S4 object signatures
• S4L learned representations
• S5 ranking/selection/optimisation

rect.style: fill: light-dark(rgb(255, 255, 255), rgb(18, 18, 18)); stroke: light-dark(rgb(40, 128, 88), rgb(88, 164, 130));

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe flex-start; width: 428px; height: 1px; padding-top: 90px; margin-left: 527px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: left; color: #000000;
display: inline-block; font-size: 16px; font-family: Helvetica; color: light-dark(#000000, #ffffff); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;

div.div:
S2 design principles
• registry-defined IO (no hard-coded paths)
• explicit transformations (no silent smoothing/aggregation)
• controlled spatial support (canonical 10 m grid)
• descriptive-only station summaries (no decision logic)

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe flex-start; justify-content: unsafe flex-start; width: 1px; height: 1px; padding-top: 7px; margin-left: 72px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: left; color: #000000;
display: inline-block; font-size: 16px; font-family: Helvetica; color: light-dark(#000000, #ffffff); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; font-weight: bold; white-space: nowrap;
